entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, introduced as he takes a seat and is addressed by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of the school, who greets Voldemort warmly and offers him a drink.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at the school, whose seat Voldemort takes in the present.

relationships.description: Dumbledore greets Voldemort warmly and offers him a drink.
Voldemort is offered a drink by Dumbledore.
